0.3.0.name: postcss-responsive
0.3.0.description: PostCSS plugin that improves developer experience of responsive design

scripts.release: pnpm release:check && pnpm release:version && pnpm release:publish
scripts.release:version: bumpp package.json --execute="pnpm release:changelog && git add changelog.md" --commit "build: publish v%s" --tag --all
scripts.test: pnpm lint && pnpm test:types && pnpm test:unit
